=== Current Issues ===

Things that doesn't work:

Webcam (no drivers by now).

Sound Volume Hotkeys.

Splash screen when booting. It doesn't show, just screen remain blank, and some times it does not complete booting sequence. Just Eliminate "splash" in the grub booting sequence, and you woll have a perfect boot, in text mode.
